channel_price.description: Price of the channel. Should be a numeric value with up to 2 decimal places.

user_id.description: User id; the person in charge

approval_rights[].description: Users id with sale approving authority

exposer_order.description: the exposure order of a channel the less the number the more it appears on the top of the list

bh_sale_commissions.description: BH Sale Commission. If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

contact_notifications.description: Flag indicating if the channel needs contact notification

referral_bonusRadioOptions.description: Referral bonus application will be applied or not

referral_bonus.description: Referal Bonus (required if referral_bonusRadioOptions is 'applied'). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

bp.description: Branch Representative(BP). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

ba.description: Branch Representative(BA). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

md.description: Headquarters Representative (MD). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

pmd.description: Headquarters Representative (PMD). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

h_mdRadioOptions.description: Option for Headquarters representative allowance (HMD) will be applied or not

h_md.description: Headquarters representative allowance (HMD) (required if h_mdRadioOptions is 'applied'). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

h_pmdRadioOptions.description: Headquarters representative allowance (HPMD) will be applied or not

h_pmd.description: Headquarters representative allowance (HPMD) (required if h_pmdRadioOptions is 'applied'). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.

banner.description: Banner photo file. Accepts only jpeg, png, jpg, gif

sales_person_image.description: Sales person photo file. Accepts only jpeg, png, jpg

product_price.description: Price of the product. Should be a numeric value with up to 2 decimal places.

user_id.description: User id; the person in charge

exposer_order.description: the exposure order of a product the less the number the more it appears on the top of the list

h_md.description: Headquarters representative allowance (HMD) (required if h_mdRadioOptions is 'applied'). If commission_type is 'with-ratio', value can be a percentage (up to 100). If commission_type is 'fixed price', value can be any number.
